text: As Jesus looked at him, he felt love for the man and said to him, “One thing yoʋ lack: 10:21 Go ¦ If yoʋ wish to be perfect, go ANTGo and sell all that yoʋ have and give to the poor, and yoʋ will have treasure in heaven; and 10:21 take up yoʋr cross and 95% {ANT 1.8%} ¦ --- CT 1.5%take up yoʋr cross and come follow me.”
